item.title: Transport v1.2.0.1
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.2.0.1
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 12 Nov 2019 16:26:05 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.2.0.1]
New features:
- IV_Fast mode
- Save file now saves ITX and TDMS
- Updates to Control Experiment.vi

Bug fixes:
- save data in Lockin_time
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.4.27
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.4.27
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 12 Nov 2019 13:38:07 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging PPMS status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for controlling the magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (for PPM2)

Release Notes: [1.4.4.27]
update ports:
- 29171 (PPMS)
- 29172 (PPMS2)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.11.22
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.11.22
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 12 Nov 2019 13:18:48 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.8.11.22]
- Update server port to 29170
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.10.21
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.10.21
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 11 Nov 2019 14:00:21 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.8.10.21]
- Fix issue that could case the DAQ process to start in sweep mode
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LVtoITX v2.7.0.3
item.description:
Product: LVtoITX v2.7.0.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 07 Nov 2019 22:02:42 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read Igor Text Files (*.itx) and text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat).

Release Notes: [2.7.0.3]
- add functionality for writing and reading TDMS files and converting ITX to TDMS
- this release fixes issue with orphaned HDF5 files
- bug fixes in LV to ITX Retrieve.vi
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.9.19
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.9.19
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 04 Nov 2019 10:39:07 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.8.9.19]
Added Package Dependencies:
- Instruments
- ZeroMQ
- GUID
- Voltage Update

item.title: Transport v1.1.14.47
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.1.14.47
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 31 Oct 2019 15:53:35 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.1.14.47]
- Bug fixes to support PPMS
- Lockin_sweep now calls sweepStop when stopping before end of sweep
- Control Experiment has placeholders for Pickering functions
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.3.26
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.3.26
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 31 Oct 2019 15:05:35 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging PPMS status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for controlling the magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (for PPM2)

Release Notes: [1.4.3.26]
- Remove "set" functions from UIs
- Fix field limits for PPMS 1 (+/- 90 kOe and LHe > 60%)
- Add flashing indicator to UI
